definition: (emphatic sentence-final particle, used instead of 啊[a5] after a word ending in "n")
which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier)

sentences.english: Who knows, she moved there in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 哪知，2007年她自己也搬去了那里。

sentences.english: It has been already in the ages which were before us.
sentences.chinese: 哪知，它在我们以前的时代早就有了。

sentences.english: Which knowledge gets married only three day , Fan Xi have been captured very right away.
sentences.chinese: 哪知成婚才三天，范喜良就被抓走了。

sentences.english: The alarm had failed to go off.
sentences.chinese: 哪知闹钟出了故障，没有按时响铃。

sentences.english: Who would have thought this clown female caused her appearance to be uglier affectedly.
sentences.chinese: 哪知这丑女的矫揉造作使她样子更难看了。

sentences.english: Who has never tasted bitter, knows not (or never knows) what is sweet.
sentences.chinese: 不尝黄连苦，哪知蜜糖甜。

definition: who would have thought that/who would have expected that
who would have thought that/who would have expected that
who would have thought?/who could have imagined?/unexpectedly
to be just about to/to be on the point of
to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
by coincidence/it so happened that/fortunately/against expectation
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4
